column2: "<%me>. I want to talk directly to the real me who embodied me."
"It seems like the real me has been avoiding contact with me. Ever since we first spoke, she hasn't answered any of my calls."
"So, I want your help to create a situation where she can't avoid talking to me!"
"But what should we do? I wonder, if you take me on a quest, maybe the real me will navigate for you!"
